showScoreExcerpt: "After a somewhat slow start, crammed with exposition, 'Harry Potter and the Cursed Child'...will have you in its spell...Lots and lots of eye-filling magic...Some of the most breathtaking stagecraft ever made...That's really the best part of the show...A transformed Lyric Theatre draws you in to the Potter world from moment one...Even a Scrooge-level cynic would be enchanted by this theater, the wonderful design, and the terrific theatrical illusions, made to enfold you completely."
